resources.string:
Welcome to Lunar Tag.

 Before you proceed, you MUST understand and agree to the following:

 1. Permissions: To function correctly, this app requires persistent access to your device's CAMERA and PRECISE LOCATION (GPS). It cannot work without these permissions.

 2. Geotagging: When a photo is captured, the app will embed your current GPS coordinates, timestamp, and other details into a permanent watermark on the image.

 3. Audit & Compliance: All critical actions (photo captures, timestamp assignments, sending) are logged for auditing purposes. The real capture time is always recorded, even when a custom timestamp is used.

 4. Automated Sending: The app is designed to automatically schedule and initiate sending photos to a pre-configured WhatsApp group at their assigned time.

 5. No Guarantee: The reliability of this app depends on factors outside of our control, including device performance, battery level, operating system restrictions, network signal, and GPS availability.

 By clicking "Accept & Continue", you acknowledge these terms and agree to use Lunar Tag at your own risk.
